About Me

My name is ABI RAHUL.B, I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering at St. Joseph's Institute of Technology, specializing in Computer Science and Engineering. I am deeply passionate about learning new technologies and am driven by a strong problem-solving instinct. With robust analytical skills, I approach challenges creatively and thrive in collaborative environments. My achievements include winning awards in events like PROJECT EXPO and leading teams effectively. Notably, I emerged victorious in the YESIST12 IEEE. Beyond my academic pursuits, I harbor aspirations of establishing a startup or delving into research within the field of genetics.

Work Profile

Project 1

Herbal Cyber Guardians - Ayurvedic Plant Identification - A platform that aims to provide awareness about natural medicines over English medicines. This platform helps in providing favourable insights such as scientific name, medicinal details, chemical composition, conditions for use, by just scanning the plant using a Deep Learning Algorithm. It also has the functionality to find the natural remedy for the given health problem.

Project 2

Error 404 - Face Detection and Attendance System - An application that is primarily installed in groups, like colleges, schools, or societies, can be used only when connected to a specific WiFi produced by a WiFi module within a specific range. After connection, it asks for Biometric Authentication. Afterwards, it predicts using face recognition and marks attendance for that particular student.
